transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> FactWatchesRAW
source(output(
		SK_CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		TaxID as string,
		Status as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleInitial as string,
		Gender as string,
		Tier as integer,
		DOB as date,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		City as string,
		StateProv as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone1 as string,
		Phone2 as string,
		Phone3 as string,
		Email1 as string,
		Email2 as string,
		NationalTaxRateDesc as string,
		NationalTaxRate as decimal(6,5),
		LocalTaxRateDesc as string,
		LocalTaxRate as decimal(6,5),
		AgencyID as string,
		CreditRating as integer,
		NetWorth as decimal(10,0),
		MarketingNameplate as string,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as integer,
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
source(output(
		SK_SecurityID as integer,
		Symbol as string,
		Issue as string,
		Status as string,
		Name as string,
		ExchangeID as string,
		SK_CompanyID as integer,
		SharesOutstanding as integer,
		FirstTrade as date,
		FirstTradeOnExchange as date,
		Dividend as integer,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as decimal(5,0),
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimSecurity
source(output(
		SK_DateID as integer,
		DateValue as date,
		DateDesc as string,
		CalendarYearID as decimal(4,0),
		CalendarYearDesc as string,
		CalendarQtrID as decimal(5,0),
		CalendarQtrDesc as string,
		CalendarMonthID as decimal(6,0),
		CalendarMonthDesc as string,
		CalendarWeekID as decimal(6,0),
		CalendarWeekDesc as string,
		DayOfWeeknumeric as decimal(1,0),
		DayOfWeekDesc as string,
		FiscalYearID as decimal(4,0),
		FiscalYearDesc as string,
		FiscalQtrID as decimal(5,0),
		FiscalQtrDesc as string,
		HolidayFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimDate
FactWatchesRAW derive({_col0_} = toShort(byName('_col0_')),
		{_col1_} = toString(byName('_col1_')),
		{_col2_} = toTimestamp(byName('_col2_')),
		{_col3_} = toString(byName('_col3_'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		W_C_ID = {_col0_},
		W_S_SYMB = {_col1_},
		W_DTS = {_col2_},
		W_ACTION = {_col3_}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, CID join(W_C_ID==CustomerID&&toDate(substring(toString(W_DTS),1,10))>=EffectiveDate&&toDate(substring(toString(W_DTS),1,10))<EndDate,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
DimCustomer select(mapColumn(
		SK_CustomerID,
		CustomerID,
		EffectiveDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CID
Join1, DimSecurity join(W_S_SYMB==Symbol&&toDate(substring(toString(W_DTS),1,10))>=CID@EffectiveDate&&toDate(substring(toString(W_DTS),1,10))<CID@EndDate,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
DimSecurity select(mapColumn(
		SK_SecurityID,
		Symbol,
		EffectiveDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SEC
